hero.tagline: We construct the future with AX Consulting and AI Solutions.
hero.subtitle: Transforming problems into pathways.

about.heading: We Make the Way
about.description: Even when others see the impossible, we find a path forward. Where there seems to be a dead end, we open new possibilities through technology and creativity, helping you move ahead.

innovation.title: Innovative Thinking
innovation.description: We deliver creative solutions that go beyond conventional frameworks

execution.title: Rapid Execution
execution.description: Our speed in turning ideas into reality is our greatest strength

partnership.title: True Partnership
partnership.description: We're not just vendors—we're partners who solve problems together

services.sectionSubtitle: We accompany you through every digital journey

axConsulting.title: AX Consulting
axConsulting.description: App Experience Consulting. We dissect user interactions to build intuitive, engaging, and high-conversion digital experiences.

aiApps.title: AI Disposable Apps
aiApps.description: Rapid AI prototyping. We build focused, lightweight AI applications designed to solve specific problems instantly.

fde.title: FDE Solutions
fde.description: Forward Deployed Engineering. Like Palantir's FDEs, our engineers embed with your team to solve critical AX and data problems on the ground.

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.description: Tailored software for enterprises and individuals. From internal tools to customer-facing platforms, we craft the perfect fit.

appDev.title: App Development & Distribution
appDev.description: End-to-end app lifecycle management. We build, deploy, and scale varied applications across global markets.

process.sectionSubtitle: A systematic 4-step approach to project success

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We deeply understand your problem. We identify business goals, current situation, and constraints to set the optimal direction.

analysis.title: Analysis & Design
analysis.description: We design solutions based on gathered information. We select tech stack, configure architecture, and establish project timeline.

development.title: Development
development.description: We develop rapidly using agile methodology. We adjust direction through regular feedback cycles.

support.title: Deploy & Support
support.description: We deploy reliably and provide ongoing support. We respond quickly when issues arise.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Stories from those we've worked with

items.quote: They implemented a feature I thought was impossible in just 2 weeks. I truly experienced what it means to 'make a way'.
items.author: Minsu Kim

items.quote: We struggled with a technical issue for 6 months, and WayMaker provided a clear solution. Thanks to them, our project got back on track.
items.author: Jihyun Lee

items.quote: As a solo developer, I felt limited. Through the FDE service, I learned so much in a short time. Now I can solve many more problems on my own.
items.author: Junyoung Park

items.question: How is pricing determined?
items.answer: It depends on the project's scope and complexity. After an initial consultation to understand your requirements, we provide a transparent quote. Small projects use fixed pricing, while larger projects use milestone-based billing.

items.question: How long does development take?
items.answer: It varies by project: AI disposable apps take 1-2 weeks, typical web/app development 4-8 weeks, and large custom solutions 2-4 months. We'll provide an accurate timeline after consultation.

items.question: What tech stack do you use?
items.answer: We use modern tech stacks including React, Next.js, Flutter, Python, and Node.js. For AI solutions, we integrate OpenAI and Anthropic APIs. We select the optimal technology for each project's requirements.

items.question: Do you provide maintenance support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance contracts after project completion. We support bug fixes, feature additions, and performance improvements, with 24-hour response for urgent issues.

items.question: Can you handle small projects?
items.answer: Absolutely. From simple landing pages to complex enterprise systems, we work diligently regardless of scale. We actually prefer starting with small projects to build trust.

contact.heading: Ready to make your way?
contact.subheading: Whether you need AX consulting, a custom AI solution, or an FDE team, we are here to help.
